techmeme.title: Sources: OpenAI has completed a deal to raise over $6.5B in new funding led by Thrive Capital, giving it a $150B+ valuation (Bloomberg)
Google updates Gmail for Android and iOS with new summary cards that are more glanceable and actionable and a new "Happening soon" section above the inbox (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Some iOS developers worry that an iOS 18 change letting users choose contacts an app can access may make growing social apps hard; Apple says it boosts privacy (Kevin Roose/New York Times)
Livestream marketplace Whatnot says its GMV passed $2B+ in 2024 and its top 500 sellers each sold $1M+ on the platform; 66% of its sellers earn $10K+ per month (Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch)
Automattic demanded an 8% cut of WP Engine's monthly revenue to use the WordPress trademark in a seven-year deal proposed on September 20; WP Engine declined (Emma Roth/The Verge)
